Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HDIGINPUT

The basic type HDIGINPUT is a handle to an digital audio input device.

Discussion

HDIGINPUT handles are returned from the AIL_open_input function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_close_input, AIL_get_input_info, AIL_open_input, AIL_set_input_state
